root.name: SingStar: Singalong with Disney
root.description: OverviewSingStar: Singalong with Disney is a music game developed by SCE London Studio and published by Sony Computer Entertainment Europe for the PlayStation 2 platform.Tracks101 Dalmatians - Cruella de VilAladdin - A Whole New WorldThe Aristocats - Ev'rybody Wants To Be A CatBeauty and the Beast - Beauty and the BeastCinderella - Bibbidi-bobbidi-booCinderella - The Work SongThe Jungle Book - I Wanna Be Like YouThe Jungle Book - The Bare NecessitiesLady and the Tramp - He's A TrampThe Lion King - Cirlce of LifeThe Lion King - I Just Can't Wait To Be KingThe Little Mermaid - Kiss The GirlThe Little Mermaid - Under The SeaPeter Pan - Following The LeaderPeter Pan - You Can FlyPinocchio - When You Wish Upon A StarSleeping Beauty - I WonderSleeping Beauty - Once Upon A DreamTarzan - Son Of ManToy Story - You Got A Friend In MeWinnie The Pooh - Winnie The Pooh
